channel.title: Howtos on Open Live Writer Plugins
channel.description: Recent content in Howtos on Open Live Writer Plugins

item.title: Install
item.description: Using Live Writer Plugin Manager by @ScottIsAFool Just download the software, install it and launch it as admin, otherwise it won’t install them. Close Open Live and Browse for the plugin. It will install it automatically. That’s it! It can also uninstall/remove them.
